timeline.title: Computer Science Degree
timeline.description: Completed a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science at California State University, Sacramento, culminating years of academic study with hands-on project experience.

timeline.title: ChurchLink Platform Handoff
timeline.description: Successfully delivered a complete Web & App Builder Platform to our client. The system enables church staff to manage content, handle multi-language localization, and process donations.

timeline.title: GenUI Deep Researcher Agent
timeline.description: Built a working Deep Researcher Agent integrating Google Custom Search Engine with LangGraph. The system uses graph-theory orchestration to compile structured reports featuring images, tables, and source citations.

timeline.title: Zharvis v2 Game Overlay
timeline.description: Launched version two of Zharvis, an Overwolf overlay providing AI-powered in-game assistance. Upgraded from RAG-based retrieval (15k+ docs) to Wiki CSE and MCP tools for faster query responses.

timeline.title: First SaaS Success
timeline.description: Collaborated with a team of 3 developers to build and sell videogame modifications for CS:GO. Generated $6k in revenue over a year of active development and community engagement.

timeline.title: GPU Mining Operation
timeline.description: Assembled a 7-GPU Ethereum mining rig using Nvidia and AMD cards, achieving ~210 MH/s. Generated $170 monthly passive income before the Ethereum Merge ended PoW mining.

timeline.title: First GitHub Commit
timeline.description: Pushed my first commit to GitHub at age 15, showcasing a Java drawing application from my sophomore year. This milestone marked the beginning of my journey as a software developer.
